name: Alone (itch) (nomonomicon)
description:
Playtime: 5-10 minutes

A Short Atmospheric Subversion of Survival-Horror games like Slenderman.

Contact Information and Links-
If you need to contact me then I'm available most of the time on the Nomonomicon Discord discord.gg/bHcpcH9
My patreon serves as a landing page from which you can find all my social media (Twitter, Facebook, Subreddit, Ect.)   https://www.patreon.com/Nomonomicon
